summary: A mentally disabled giant and his level headed guardian find work at a sadistic cowboy's ranch in depression era America.
cast: Burgess Meredith|Betty Field|Lon Chaney Jr.|Charles Bickford|Roman Bohnen|Bob Steele|Noah Beery Jr.|Oscar O'Shea|Granville Bates|Leigh Whipper|Helen Lynd|Silver Tip Baker|John Beach|Baldwin Cooke|Whitney De Rahm|Eddie Dunn|Henriette Kay|Jack Lawrence|Howard M. Mitchell|Barbara Pepper|Carl Pitti|Charles Watt
title: La fuerza bruta
